name: Cave Domain
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Animal and Terrain Domains/Cave Domain

sections.body: The wonders and dark secrets of the deepest caves give you strength.
sections.name: Granted Powers

sections.body: You can grant darkvision 60 feet to a willing creature you touch. This effect lasts 1 minute, or 1 hour if used on yourself. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
sections.name: Cavesight
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Animal and Terrain Domains/Cave Domain/Cavesight

sections.body: At 6th level, you gain tremorsense 30 feet. At 12th level, you gain tremorsense 60 feet.
sections.name: Tremorsense
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Druid/Animal and Terrain Domains/Cave Domain/Tremorsense

sections.body: 1st—detect aberration, 2nd—stone call, 3rd—deeper darkness, 4th—echolocation, 5th—wall of stone, 6th—conjure black pudding, 7th—statue (looking like a stalagmite or stalactite), 8th—earthquake, 9th—imprisonment.
